eurecom.spacegraph.graphalgorithm

Class Fortune

  • java.lang.Object
    • eurecom.spacegraph.graphalgorithm.Fortune
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Voronoi

    public class Fortune
extends java.lang.Object
implements Voronoi
    This class is used to generate voronoi diagrams according to the Fortune's Algorithm. This algorithm runs in O(nlogn) time (average and worst case) and it uses O(n) storage.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jerome Haerri

      • voronoiStep

        public void voronoiStep()
        Step of the Fortune's Algorithm. In each step, it includes a new point and create either the siteEvents and the CircleEvents which will create the edges.

      • checkDegenerate

        public void checkDegenerate()
        Perform degenerate checks to see if two (or more) points have the same X coordinate. In that case, the X coordinate is increased by one unit. If one increased point is translated out of bounds, we simply remove this obstacle.

      • paintDelaunay
